org.xbib.catalog.entities

Interface WorkerPoolListener<W extends WorkerPool<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    W - the worker pool type parameter

    public interface WorkerPoolListener<W extends WorkerPool<?>>

    A callback listener for the state of the worker pool. Receives events of success or failure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void failure(W workerPool, java.util.Map<java.lang.Runnable,java.lang.Throwable> exceptions)
      Emits a map of exceptions of all erraneous workers.
      void success(W workerPool)
      Emits success if all workers were terminated without exception.

    • Method Detail

      • success

        void success(W workerPool)

        Emits success if all workers were terminated without exception.

        Parameters:
        workerPool - the worker pool

      • failure

        void failure(W workerPool,
             java.util.Map<java.lang.Runnable,java.lang.Throwable> exceptions)

        Emits a map of exceptions of all erraneous workers.

        Parameters:
        workerPool - the worker pool
        exceptions - the worker exceptions
